data.text: Thus saith the
But I will send a fire upon Moab, and it shall devour the palaces of Kerioth: and Moab shall die with tumult, with shouting,
And I will cut off the judge from the midst thereof, and will slay all the princes thereof with him, saith the
¶ Thus saith the
But I will send a fire upon Judah, and it shall devour the palaces of Jerusalem.
¶ Thus saith the
That pant after the dust of the earth on the head of the poor, and turn aside the way of the meek: and a man and his father will go in unto the
And they lay
¶ Yet destroyed I the Amorite before them, whose height
Also I brought you up from the land of Egypt, and led you forty years through the wilderness, to possess the land of the Amorite.
And I raised up of your sons for prophets, and of your young men for Nazarites.
But ye gave the Nazarites wine to drink; and commanded the prophets, saying, Prophesy not.
Behold, I am pressed under you, as a cart is pressed
Therefore the flight shall perish from the swift, and the strong shall not strengthen his force, neither shall the mighty deliver himself:
Neither shall he stand that handleth the bow; and
And
